_header: God send us peace and unity / In England with prosperity
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 488.
_description: ‘Do well & drede no man’ — four 6-line stanzas with this refrain plus burden: ‘The beste rede that I can / Do well and drede no man’

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
God sende vs pese & vniteIn engelong with
                    prosperite…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…That we mow say as y beganDo well & drede no
                    man
